name: Clear Advantage
author: k5y1jEYMBqd9uLUx
command:
game.gmtoolkit.advantage.update(token, "clear")

/* ==========
* MACRO: Clear Advantage
* VERSION: 0.9.5
* UPDATED: 2022-08-04
* DESCRIPTION: Resets Advantage for the selected token to 0.
* TIP: Token does not have to be added to an encounter in the Combat Tracker.
========== */
